attributes.action: Convince David Cameron to serve his full elected parliamentary term...
attributes.background: The EU referendum was never a vote on David Cameron's leadership or his ability to lead our country. I believe he has been a genuine, honourable & positive Prime Minister for Great Britain & feel he is the right person to guide us through this turbulence & ensure a positive future for our children.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
